long_description: Sport Beans(TM), from the makers of Jelly Belly(R) beans, are specially formulated to fuel your body before, during and after exercise. Simply explained, Sport Beans are Jelly Beans formulated with carbohydrates, electrolytes and vitamins B and C. Eat one packet with one to two cups of water about 30 minutes before exercising. During a long workout, eat one packet every 45 minutes. Eat after a workout to replenish muscles of depleted carbohydrates. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Sport Beans(TM), from the makers of Jelly Belly(R) beans, are specially formulated to fuel your body before, during and after exercise.
